summary: A collection of high‑level programmatic interfaces that expose Conan's core capabilities—cache handling, configuration management, remote repository operations, package export/import, dependency graph analysis, installation, building, searching, listing, removal, and workspace handling—allowing users to orchestrate package manager actions from code.
business_intent: Enable developers and automation tools to integrate, script, and automate Conan package management tasks within CI/CD pipelines, custom tooling, and development workflows, reducing manual command‑line interaction and improving reproducibility.
